settings.title: 5 Reasons Why You Need Window Tint Now
UV Protection
settings.text: Window film virtually blocks out all ultraviolet (UV) rays from the sun, acting like a layer of sunscreen to protect you, your vehicle, home, or business.

settings.title: IR Rejection
settings.text: Infrared radiation (IR) is responsible for that burning heat you feel on your arm while you wait at a traffic light. Window film with IR protection can help make your commute more comfortable by taking away that annoying burn.

settings.title: Increases Comfort
settings.text: Window film can make your vehicle, house, or business a more comfortable place to be. Window film helps cool and comfort by reducing heat in the space.

settings.title: Glare Reduction
settings.text: Glare can be a nuisance and even dangerous while driving. Whether it be from the sun, headlights, or a reflection, window film will help reduce the glare.

settings.title: Privacy & Security
settings.text: With window film, you can give yourself more privacy in your vehicle, home, or business. Thicker safety & security films can also help with break-ins by making smash-and-grab robberies more difficult as well as adding an extra level of protection in case of glass shards.

settings.title: Save On Energy Costs
settings.text: Window film allows you to save on energy costs for your home or business. By reducing heat, you are saving your air conditioning unit from running as often.
